Package Project2

Class FileList

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<Comparable[]>
Project2.FileList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<Comparable[]>, Collection<Comparable[]>, List<Comparable[]>, RandomAccess
public class FileList extends AbstractList<Comparable[]> implements List<Comparable[]>, RandomAccess, Serializable
This class allows data tuples/tuples (e.g., those making up a relational table) to be stored in a random access file. This implementation requires that each tuple be packed into a fixed length byte array.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add(Comparable[] tuple)
      Add a new tuple into the file list by packing it into a record and writing this record to the random access file. Write the record either at the end-of-file or into a empty slot.
      Specified by:
      add in interface Collection<Comparable[]>
      Specified by:
      add in interface List<Comparable[]>
      Overrides:
      add in class AbstractList<Comparable[]>
      Parameters:
      tuple - the tuple to add
      Returns:
      whether the addition succeeded
